chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
q: nat
l: nat
f2: nat -> nat
f1: nat -> nat
b: nat
a: nat

Goal:
(forall i : nat, i < l -> f1 i = f2 i) -> is_cipher_of f1 a -> is_cipher_of f2 b -> a = b

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
is_cipher_of = fun (f : nat -> nat) (a : nat) => l + 1 < q /\ (forall i : nat, i < l -> f i < power q 2) /\ a = ∑ l (fun i : nat => f i * power (power (S i) 2) r) : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_cipher_of _%function_scope _%nat_scope
is_cipher_of_inj : forall (f1 f2 : nat -> nat) (a : nat), is_cipher_of f1 a -> is_cipher_of f2 a -> forall i : nat, i < l -> f1 i = f2 i
power_decomp_unique' : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp_unique : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp.power_decomp_unique' : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp.power_decomp_unique : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
nat_meet_powers_neq : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall i j a b : nat, i <> j -> a < r -> b < r -> a * power i r ⇣ (b * power j r) = 0
is_cipher_of_0 : forall (f : nat -> nat) (a : nat), l = 0 -> is_cipher_of f a < -> 1 < q /\ a = 0
binary_le_power_inv : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall i a b : nat, a ≲ b * power i r -> {a' : nat | a = a' * power i r /\ a' ≲ b}
is_digit = fun c q i y : nat => y < q /\ (exists a b : nat, c = (a * q + y) * power i q + b /\ b < power i q) : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_digit (_ _ _ _)%nat_scope
utils_nat.nat_sinc_inj : forall (f : nat -> nat) (a b : nat), (forall x y : nat, a <= x < y /\ y <= b -> f x < f y) -> forall x y : nat, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> f x = f y -> x = y
nat_meet_powers_eq : forall q r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall i a b : nat, a * power i r ⇣ (b * power i r) = a ⇣ b * power i r
Hseq_u : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> forall a : nat, a <= m -> ∑ a (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) = msum nat_join 0 a (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))
Nat.mod_small_iff : forall a b : nat, b <> 0 -> a mod b = a < -> a < b
sum_power_binary_lt_inv : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (p n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat) (m : nat), 0 < p <= q -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ (power p 2 - 1) * ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> exists a : nat -> nat, m = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) r) /\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < power p 2)
Nat.div_small_iff : forall a b : nat, b <> 0 -> a / b = 0 < -> a < b
sum_power_binary_lt : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (p n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), 0 < p <= q -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < power p 2) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) r) ≲ (power p 2 - 1) * ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r)
plus_cancel_l : forall a b c : nat, a + b = a + c -> b = c
power_decomp.power_decomp_is_digit : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (a f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> is_digit (∑ n (fun i0 : nat => a i0 * power (f i0) p)) p (f i) (a i)
power_decomp_is_digit : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (a f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> is_digit (∑ n (fun i0 : nat => a i0 * power (f i0) p)) p (f i) (a i)
power_decomp_factor : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a (S i) * power (f (S i) - f 0 - 1) p) * power (S (f 0)) p + a 0 * power (f 0) p
power_decomp.power_decomp_factor : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a (S i) * power (f (S i) - f 0 - 1) p) * power (S (f 0)) p + a 0 * power (f 0) p
const_u2_meet : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> 2 * k < k' -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i = power (S i) 2) -> forall p : nat, p = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) < -> p = ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) (power (4 * q) 2)))
sum_powers_injective : forall (r n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (m : nat) (g : nat -> nat), 2 <= r -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> g i < g j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (g i) r) -> n = m /\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i)
const_u1_meet : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> 2 * k < k' -> forall p : nat, p = u * u ⇣ w < -> p = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))
sum_powers_ortho : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> e i = e j -> i = j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r)
const_u1_eq : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> 2 * k < k' -> u * u ⇣ w = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))
const_u1_prefix : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> {q0 : nat | q0 <= m /\ u * u ⇣ w = ∑ q0 (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))}
Hu2_w : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) (power (4 * q) 2))) ⇣ w = 0
binary_le_sum_powers : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f g e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) ≲ ∑ n (fun i : nat => g i * power (e i) r) < -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i ≲ g i)
meet_sum_powers : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f g e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) ⇣ ∑ n (fun i : nat => g i * power (e i) r) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i ⇣ g i * power (e i) r)
binary_le_sum_powers_inv : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat) (m : nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) -> {g : nat -> nat | m = ∑ n (fun i : nat => g i * power (e i) r) /\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i ≲ f i)}
Hu1 : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) = msum nat_join 0 m (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))
sinc_injective : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> f i = f j -> i = j
smono_upto_injective : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> f i = f j -> i = j
msum_plus : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (a b : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum m u (a + b) f = m (msum m u a f) (msum m u b (fun i : nat => f (a + i)))
sum_powers_binary_le_inv : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat) (m : nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) -> {k : nat & {g : nat -> nat & {h : nat -> nat | m = ∑ k (fun i : nat => g i * power (e (h i)) r) /\ k <= n /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> g i <> 0 /\ g i ≲ f (h i)) /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> h i < n) /\ (forall i j : nat, i < j < k -> h i < h j)}}}
bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
mk_full : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall w u u1 u2 : nat, 1 + (power (4 * q) 2 - 1) * w = power (S (power (S l) 2)) (power (4 * q) 2) -> u * u = u1 + u2 -> u1 = u * u ⇣ w -> u2 = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) -> power 2 (power (4 * q) 2) + u1 = u + power (power (S l) 2) (power (4 * q) 2) -> {m : nat & {k : nat -> nat | u1 = ∑ (S m) (fun i : nat => power (k i) (power (4 * q) 2)) /\ m <= power (S l) 2 /\ (forall i : nat, i < S m -> k i <= power (S l) 2) /\ (forall i j : nat, i < j < S m -> k i < k j)}}
msum_ext : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i) -> msum m u n f = msum m u n g
double_sum_powers_ortho : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, j < i < n -> f i j < r) -> (forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 < i1 < n -> j2 < i2 < n -> e i1 j1 = e i2 j2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r)) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r))

```coq
intros.
intros.
intros.
intros.
intros.
intros H1 H2 H3.
apply plus_cancel_l with (a := a).
apply Hu1; assumption.
apply Hu1; assumption.
apply power_decomp_unique; auto.
```

original: intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros H1 H2 H3. apply plus_cancel_l with (a := a). apply Hu1; auto. apply Hu1; auto. apply power_decomp_unique; auto.
